bug.author: rahulrajpl
bug.summary: st.file_uploader() opens camera in android phone
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I have hosted an app here <denchmark-link:https://wexda.herokuapp.com/>https://wexda.herokuapp.com/</denchmark-link> When I access it via android phone, it open the camera when I click file uploader. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Go to <denchmark-link:https://wexda.herokuapp.com/>https://wexda.herokuapp.com/</denchmark-link> from an android phone and click on the browse file link <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Open phone's file browser to upload csv file <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
I expected it to open the file browser. In some phone, it open the choice of application to open, camera is also listed along with file browser. In some cases, without option, it directly opens the camera. It should directly open the file browser in android. Camera shouldn't even come in the option. <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.61.0 Python version: 3.7.6 Using Conda? PipEnv OS version: Ubuntu 19.10 (Eoan Ermine) Browser version: Android Chrome 83.0.4103.96
